Hi McDonald's, i wish to express my concern on your Happy Meal. I have been ordering the Happy Meal for my daugter through McDelivery online every other week & 99% of my orders doesn't come with a toy. Each time I thought the rider might have forgotten to pass it to me. The order before my latest order, when I didn't receive the toy, I called the hotline to inform & the staff told me she would get the store manager, which handled my order, to call me. I waited to disappontment but instead, I got 2 toys, which I find it like an act of bribery. Then my recent order, which I ordered online, I actually indicated on the remarks column to not forget the toy, then again when the rider came, I checked & it was missing. This time i was furious. I called the hotline & asked, to my suprise, the staff told me to indicate on the remarks column, which I did during that order, if I wanted the toy. Why do I need to do so when it's a Happy Meal & it SHOULD comes with a toy?? It's just too ridiculous. When I bought it over the counter, I don't need to request for it. It's not a Happy Meal if it doesn't comes with a toy.   

I could pm u my email address which was used to place all the orders if you wish to clarify. Looking forward for ur reply.

https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/q82/s720x720/1489045_10151833566422116_1966881519_n.jpg

the portion is so TINY!
Dun waste yr $...

I agree and it's small..
KFC's breakfast is so much better and cheaper.

The proof is in the pen!

Let's go KFC from tomorrow onwards 😆
The wrap is smaller than a harshbrown! It's so.... small :(

Dear McDonald's, hope you can look into the size of the sunrise roll! I am not a big eater, but it is seemingly small to fill up any stomach especially the guys. Just a sincere feedback that hopefully the Management can review. Thanks!
Ah.... Damn small... I rather go to KFC for their breakfast wrap. Thank u very much.
I bought it and I'm not satisfied with it, it's too small for me. =(
Slightly Bigger than my ezlink card lol ....

bcos of the review, I won't even try it bcos its so small
Too small

Dear McDonalds hearing so many reviews u have to really enlarge the size if u wan customer to keep going for it..

it looks nice
But the size is too small

even small kids needs 2 or more

I hope that the sunrise roll enlarges but stil at the same price :)
not only is the portion shockingly small, the meat looked horrifically unappetizing. terrible.

I totally agree with Kang YM. I had breakfast with a female colleague and we both think it is pretty small. for a female who is petite and comment that it is small that means you would not be able to satisfy any customers with that size. We all hope that you will do something asap or you will be losing alot of breakfast customers to other fast food or even to coffeshops. Ct Haslina
I emailed them my feedback on their misleading advertising and all they could say was "we will feedback to our management. " Yeah right..
Drink plain water is more fulfilling that eating that tiny toon's serving: whatever name u called it.

The real thing looks nothing like the picture. I felt cheated when I tried it out the first time and the last time. And there is a reason why it's light. It's so light that you can't feel a thing after eating it.
Finally something new

My observation on Mcdonalds. Expensive food with small portion. 

Fillet o fish size shrunk a few yrs back. 

Quarter pounder wasnt big as before when it was first launch as a promo meal i tink 10yrs back? 

Large fries is no different from medium fries. Different packaging, same quantity.

N tis new breakfast menu? Speechless
Wanted to try it this morning, but looking at the comments saying abt the size, its better to have my bigger home made sandwich with the same delicious ingredients :)
I've paid an adult meal for a Happy Meal portion.. Major disappointment indeed..
It is freaking small. Smaller than hashbrown. Smaller than my palm. Cheat money
Maybe they should rename it kid's bfast meal :)
Rather have cha bee hoon with 2 eggs and a hot drink and still got change!
Times like these is how kfc's twisters laughing at you

24.post_text: A good day begins with a good morning. Start your day right and light with our new McDonald’s Sunrise Roll™. Taste the goodness of whole wheat tortilla filled with cheese, scrambled eggs and chicken ham or sausage.
